lead_paragraph: Ten people have died in avalanches across the West in the last 10 days, making this month the deadliest January for slides in nearly 20 years.

headline.print_headline: Colorado: A Deadly January in Avalanche Areas
headline.main: Colorado: A Deadly January in Avalanche Areas

snippet: Ten people have died in avalanches across the West in the last 10 days, making this month the deadliest January for slides in nearly 20 years.
abstract: Colorado Avalanche Information Center reports 14 deaths caused by avalanches across West in last 10 days, making January deadliest month for slides in almost two decades.
